casebody.data:
Saul MEZAMERCADO, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Douglas W. Herndon, District Judge, Respondents,
and
The State of Nevada, Real Party in Interest. No. 79281 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JULY 29, 2019
